name: Cube Commander
description: PlaceHolder Productions is excited to bring you Cube Commander, an arcade style block breaker which tasks you with the protection of a race of peaceful lifeforms and planet. The Cube Commander defends the planet from multiple waves of asteroids which threaten to destroy the peaceful citizens and their planet. Utilizing strategic mastery and engaging twitch arcade wizardry lead in the defense of the planet and its denizens for as long as you can.
